name: Try To Balance It!
description:
Cute little animals will keep you company. They like to eat, wear cool clothes, and get in your way. Relaxing leisurely game with unique gameplay! You have never seen such a game! Nice 3D graphics, physics, animations and sounds! Balance items in baskets. Balanced items are destroyed. More items in baskets - more points. The game has 46 levels and endless modes! Try to score 3 stars in each of them and earn all the achievements in the game.

Different game rules:

Destroy items - destroy food by balancing the libra.

Balance all the items - balance the food before the time is up.

2048 - merge the same cubes and keep the balance. The minimum cube is 2, the maximum is 2048.

"Match3" - stack spheres of the same color and balance the baskets.

Combo system - for the destroyed item and the merger of cubes or spheres you get coins. More coins - more points. At the end of the round, the animals compare the number of coins.

Earn crystals and spend them on power-ups:

Additional attempts - put items at the end of the queue if you run out of space.

Lightning - helps to separate cubes or spheres.

Bomb and dynamite - will help get rid of unnecessary items.

Doubling - increase the quality of a cube or sphere.

Free game modes with endless waves of items. Try to score 1, 2 or 3 million points! Take the top lines of the leaderboard! Good luck!
